Title: Requires consideration of the New York state climate leadership and community protection act in certain procurement contracts
Summary: Requires consideration of an offerer's compliance with the New York state climate leadership and community protection act in certain procurement contracts.
LawCode: Amd ยง75-0103, En Con L; amd ยง163, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the state finance law, in relation to requiring consideration of the New York state climate leadership and community protection act in certain procurement contracts
